summary: Mobile-first local service website for R Irrigation, a sprinkler and irrigation company in Northern New Jersey. Clean, professional design with deep blue and bright green color scheme. Primary goal: generate phone calls and estimate requests from homeowners. Includes homepage with hero section, services grid, reviews, and SEO-optimized city pages for Clifton, Paramus, Wayne, and Hackensack NJ.
architectural_notes: Mobile-first responsive layout optimized for fast loading
Deep blue and bright green color scheme with white/light background
Multi-page site structure: Home, Services, Service Areas, Reviews, Contact, plus 4 city-specific SEO pages
Phone number (973) 955-8340 prominently displayed in header
Professional contractor aesthetic targeting homeowners age 30+
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- R Irrigation company logo featuring water and lawn theme with deep blue and bright green colors (logo.dim_300x100.png)
- Professional sprinkler system in action on a green lawn for hero section background (hero-sprinkler.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Icon representing fast service - clock or speed symbol in deep blue (icon-fast-service.dim_64x64.png)
- Icon representing experienced technicians - tools or technician symbol in deep blue (icon-experienced.dim_64x64.png)
- Icon representing reliable work - checkmark or shield symbol in deep blue (icon-reliable.dim_64x64.png)
- Icon representing Northern NJ service - location pin or map symbol in deep blue (icon-location.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a header component with R Irrigation logo on the left, navigation menu with links to Home, Services, Service Areas, Reviews, and Contact pages, prominent phone number (973) 955-8340 displayed clearly, and a 'Get Free Estimate' button

Create homepage hero section with headline 'Sprinkler & Irrigation Services in Northern New Jersey', subheadline mentioning repairs, installs, spring startup, and winterization services, two buttons ('Call Now' and 'Request Free Estimate'), and trust line displaying 'Licensed & Insured • Fast Response • 5-Star Rated'
Create 'Why Choose R Irrigation' section with four icon bullets highlighting fast service, experienced technicians, reliable work, and serving Northern NJ
Create services grid section displaying six services: Sprinkler Repair, Sprinkler Installation, Spring Startup, Winterization, Leak Detection, and System Upgrades
Create service area section mentioning Clifton NJ prominently plus nearby towns in Bergen and Passaic County
Create customer reviews section displaying 2-3 realistic testimonial examples with customer names and service descriptions
Create a strong call-to-action block as a large, bold section encouraging phone calls for estimates and service requests
Create footer with phone number (973) 955-8340, email placeholder, service areas list, and a simple contact form for estimate requests
Create separate SEO-optimized city page for 'Sprinkler Repair Clifton NJ' with unique localized content targeting homeowners in Clifton, including local service details, benefits, and call-to-action

Create separate SEO-optimized city page for 'Irrigation Services Paramus NJ' with unique localized content targeting homeowners in Paramus, including local service details, benefits, and call-to-action
Create separate SEO-optimized city page for 'Sprinkler Repair Wayne NJ' with unique localized content targeting homeowners in Wayne, including local service details, benefits, and call-to-action

Create separate SEO-optimized city page for 'Sprinkler Service Hackensack NJ' with unique localized content targeting homeowners in Hackensack, including local service details, benefits, and call-to-action

Implement mobile-first responsive design with deep blue and bright green color scheme (water/lawn theme), white or light background, large high-contrast call-to-action buttons, and fast-loading optimizations
Apply professional, trustworthy, and clear tone throughout all content, written for homeowners age 30+ with direct language suitable for contractor services
Implement routing for all pages: Home, Services, Service Areas, Reviews, Contact, and the four city-specific SEO pages (Clifton, Paramus, Wayne, Hackensack)

new_feature_requests.summary: Homepage with hero section, why choose us, services grid, service areas, reviews, CTA block, and footer with contact form
Header with logo, navigation menu, prominent phone number (973) 955-8340, and Get Free Estimate button
SEO city pages: Sprinkler Repair Clifton NJ, Irrigation Services Paramus NJ, Sprinkler Repair Wayne NJ, Sprinkler Service Hackensack NJ with unique localized content
Mobile-first responsive design with deep blue and bright green color scheme, white/light background, high-contrast CTA buttons
